name: A Low Rez Man and his Low Rez Fish
name_original: A Low Rez Man and his Low Rez Fish
description:
This is a simple fishing game made for the LowRezJam 2021.

 Left and Right Arrows to move

 Spacebar to throw your bait

 Hold the indicated arrow keys in order to catch a fish. 

Buttons in the shop are activated with the enter key, escape takes you back to the overworld.

When you own a skin, press the numbers at the top of your keyboard to swap
